Knowledge Base API Specification

POST /search

Search documents or chunks using semantic similarity or regex patterns.

Request Body

{
  "query": "Q1 financial results",
  "mode": "semantic",
  "scope": "documents",
  "filters": { "folder": "Finance", "fileType": "pdf" },
  "max_tokens": 2000
}

Response

{
  "data": {
    "results": [
      {
        "document_id": "annual_report_2024",
        "preview": "Revenue grew by 15%...",
        "score": 0.92,
        "location": {
          "page": 23,
          "section": "Financial Results"
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}

GET /get_document_data

Fetch content in raw, structured, or summarized form.

Email patterns for testing: john@acme.com, sarah.smith@bigco.com

Financial keywords: quarterly results, Q1 revenue, $1.2M

Legal terms: force majeure, confidential information, indemnification

Last updated: March 31, 2024

Contact: procurement@supplier.com for questions
